org.clearsighted.tutorbase.emscript
Class EMScript

java.lang.Object
  org.clearsighted.tutorbase.emscript.EMScript

public class EMScript
extends java.lang.Object

Implements some functions to parse, check, and generate mapping tree for an .xpst file.

Parse an .xpst file, possibly included from another .xpst file

Parameters:
fromfname - the file from which this file was included, or null
fname - the file to be parsed
Returns:
an EMScriptParser object that contains all the data parsed from the file as internal objects
